rules_text:
Whenever you draw a card other than the first card during your draw phase, put a Book counter on Certhina Biblioplex.
Whenever an opponent draws a card other than the first card during their draw step, you may remove a Book counter from Certhina Biblioplex. If you do, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card for as long as you control Certhina Biblioplex.
